Name: Deneb: Across the Stars
About the game: Deneb: Across the Stars is a mouse-only, hardcore platformer game. There are a lot of obstacles but no checkpoints. And a small mistake can lead to an endless fall. Help astronaut Vega overcome all difficulties and find her lost colleague Altair. Game Features Simple game controls using only the mouse No checkpoints Real-time auto-save Various obstacles designed to make you fall Gorgeous pixel art graphic Beautiful soundtrack composed by 50mang Cute dogs Don't get frustrated. The reason we fall is to learn how to pick ourselves up.
